content: one row repeat pattern let the yarn do the colorwork to create this beginner-friendly crochet blanket created in soft-as-a-cloud caron cloud cakes you ll work back and forth in row with simple increases and decreases to create a dreamy blanket since the yarn is self-striping you can focus on the techniques which also include double_crochet working in back loop only double_crochet 3 together and more keep it in the soothing tones features or easily swap out shades for a livelier look yarn for model caron® cloud cakes™ 8 5 oz/240 g 760 yds/695 m royal treatment 48011 4 balls
